Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Audit
    Simple Audit class which takes a string, time stamps it and appends it to a file.
    BoardPanel
    Visualization of a 'Four In A Row' game.
    Controller  
    HighScoreButton
    JMenuItem that shows the high score with a JFrame message dialog.
    InvalidMoveException
    An error that is used to specify when an illegal play attempt was made.
    LoadGameButton
    JMenuItem that loads prompts the player to specify a file from which the model state should be read from.
    Main
    Starts the Four In A Row Model, View and Controller and sets up the appropriate connections.
    Model
    Four In A Row model.
    Options
    Options which can be modified in order to change the game play.
    ResetButton
    JMenuItem that attempts to reset the game of the model.
    SaveGameButton
    JMenuItem that saves the game state.
    SetPlayerNameMenuItem
    JMenuItem which prompts the user for a player name to change and what to change it to.
    StateDisplay
    Displays the current state of the game.
    View
    The View of the model.
